section.section: The Board shall meet once a month in a location and office provided by the State.
Special meetings of the Board may be held as the Board provides in its rules and regulations.

text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum.
The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.

Subject to the State budget, each member of the Board is entitled to:
an annual salary of $3,600; and
reimbursement for reasonable expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.
